name.description: The Spark Dispatcher will register with Mesos with this as framework name. This service will be available at http://<dcos_url>/service/<name>/

role.description: The Flink Dispatcher will register with Mesos with this role.

principal.description: The Flink Dispatcher will register with Mesos with this principal.

user.description: Executors will run as this user.

slots.description: A processing slot allows Flink to execute a distributed DataSet transformation, such as a data source or a map-transformation. As a general recommendation, the number of available CPU cores is a good default.

count.description: Number of task managers to spawn.
